headline.main: 2 JAPANESE SHIPS HIT BY OUR DIVE-BOMBERS; Transport and Corvette Set Afire in Solomons Area

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Feb. 28 -- Continued activity by our planes in the Solomons yesterday resulted in bomb hits on a Japanese transport and corvette and the destruction of one enemy plane, the Navy reported today. Our loss was two fighter planes.
abstract: Solomon Islands: US planes hit Jap transport and corvette off Vella Lavella Is; raid Munda airfield
snippet: WASHINGTON, Feb. 28 -- Continued activity by our planes in the Solomons yesterday resulted in bomb hits on a Japanese transport and corvette and the destruction of one enemy plane, the Navy reported today. Our loss was two fighter planes....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
